Name: autism spectrum disorder
Definition: A pervasive developmental disorder that is a spectrum of psychological conditions. The disease has_symptom widespread abnormalities of social interactions and communication

Name: Rett syndrome
Definition: A pervasive developmental disease that is characterized by normal early growth and development followed by a slowing of development

Name: obsolete fetal blood loss
Definition: A pervasive developmental disease that is characterized by normal early growth and development followed by a slowing of development

Name: childhood disintegrative disease
Definition: A pervasive developmental disorder that is a rare condition characterized by late onset (>3 years of age) of developmental delays in language
